content: The file cannot be copied to this room. Please try to copy the {{organizationName}} PDF form.

comment.text: This translation key displays a warning message when attempting to copy a file to a form room. It indicates that the file cannot be copied due to its format (pdf) and suggests copying the organization's pdf form instead. This message appears in the Files Selector component.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "copied" is translated as "διαγραφή" (diagrafe), which means "deletion" or "erasing." It should be translated as "αντιγραφή" (antigrafi) which means "copying".
The translation of 'room' is not ideal. 'Sala' implies a literal room, while the context suggests a defined area or space within the application. A more appropriate term might be 'área' or 'espacio'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: El archivo no se puede copiar en esta área. Por favor, intente copiar el formulario PDF de {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation 'alla volta' (one at a time) doesn't accurately convey the original meaning of the English sentence which simply indicates an issue with copying to the room. It implies a limit of one copy at a time, which isn't the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Il file non può essere copiato in questa stanza. Si prega di provare a copiare il modulo PDF {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'Si prega di provare' is a bit formal for a warning message. A more conversational tone might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Provate a copiare il modulo PDF {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ດ້ວຍ' (duay) at the end of the Lao translation could be interpreted as 'with' and doesn't fit the context of the instruction. It implies the user should copy the form 'with' something.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເອກະສານນີ້ບໍ່ສາມາດຖ່າຍອອກໄປໃນຫ້ອງນີ້ໄດ້ ກະລຸນາພະຍາຍາມຖ່າຍແບບຟອມ PDF ຂອງ {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'The file cannot be copied' is translated as 'O ficheiro não pode ser copiado'. While technically correct, a more natural and common Portuguese translation would be 'O arquivo não pode ser copiado'. 'Arquivo' is more frequently used than 'ficheiro' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O arquivo não pode ser copiado

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "PDF form" is repeated unnecessarily. It's redundant to say "formulário em PDF {{organizationName}} PDF form". The second 'PDF form' is not needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O arquivo não pode ser copiado para esta sala. Tente copiar o formulário em PDF {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Spacing after punctuation. There should be a space after the period.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O arquivo não pode ser copiado para esta sala. Tente copiar o formulário em PDF {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'această' should be 'această' (feminine, nominative case) to agree with 'sală'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Imposibil de copiat fișierul în **această** sală. Încercați să copiați formularul PDF {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "эта комнату" (this room) is grammatically correct but sounds unnatural in this context. It's more appropriate to use "в это помещение" or "в эту папку" (into this folder) to match the implied 'room' being a virtual folder or space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Файл не может быть скопирован в это помещение. Пожалуйста, попробуйте скопировать PDF-форму {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ආකෘතිය' (aakruththiaya) could be improved. While technically correct, 'ලිපි' (lipi) would be a more natural translation for 'form' in this context, referring to a document format.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම කාමරයට ගොනුව පිටපත් කළ නොහැකි ය. කරුණාකර {{organizationName}} PDF ලිපිය පිටපත් කිරීමට උත්සාහ කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Please try to copy the {{organizationName}} PDF form' is not the most natural way to express this in Slovenian. A more common and user-friendly phrasing would be 'Poskusite kopirati PDF obrazec {{organizationName}}'.
While technically correct, adding a period after 'sobo' would improve readability. Slovenian generally prefers ending sentences with a period.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Datoteke ni mogoče kopirati v to sobo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Ukrainian translation uses a hyphenated word 'PDF-форму'. While understandable, it's more natural to use the unhyphenated form 'PDF форму'.

The English phrase 'Please try to copy' is somewhat indirect. A more direct translation emphasizing action would improve clarity in Vietnamese. 'Xin hãy thử sao chép' is acceptable but could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Xin hãy sao chép biểu mẫu PDF {{organizationName}}.
